mapper.insert: INSERT INTO invoice_titles(user_id, title_type, title_name, tax_number, bank_name, bank_account, company_address, company_phone, is_default) VALUES(#{userId}, #{titleType}, #{titleName}, #{taxNumber}, #{bankName}, #{bankAccount}, #{companyAddress}, #{companyPhone}, #{isDefault})
mapper.update: UPDATE invoice_titles SET title_type = #{titleType}, title_name = #{titleName}, tax_number = #{taxNumber}, bank_name = #{bankName}, bank_account = #{bankAccount}, company_address = #{companyAddress}, company_phone = #{companyPhone}, is_default = #{isDefault} WHERE title_id = #{titleId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM invoice_titles WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM invoice_titles WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_default = 1 AND is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1
